channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: 48 Hours to Buy
channel.desc: With new jobs starting in less than a month, Pastors Jermell and Demontrice are relocating from Seattle to Atlanta, determined to find the perfect home in just one weekend. They need enough space for a family of four and a location close to the airport so their kids can visit. They'd also love to be near the vibrant arts and culture that downtown Atlanta offers.
